docs.title: renderit
docs.text:
This package is meant to render Youtube tutorial videos and reference site into the Colab or Jupyter notebooks for easy reference in future.

  • PYPI link for this package - renderit

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
installation steps

First let's do an easy pip installation of the library by running the following command - 

pip install renderit

docs.title: Rendering Youtube videos
docs.text:
example

from renderit import render_YouTube_video URL = "https://youtu.be/bVM-QujJ0AI" render_YouTube_video(URL=URL, width = 780, height = 480) ```

Args Type Description URL str input URL of a youtube video as a string height int height of the video to display in jupyter notebook, defaults to 720 width int width of the video to display in jupyter notebook, defaults to 600 Returns Type Description Response str "success" or InvalidURLException

docs.title: Rendering reference website
docs.text: example Args Type Description URL str input URL of a youtube video as a string height str height of the website to display in jupyter notebook, defaults to "600" width str width of the website to display in jupyter notebook, defaults to "100%" Returns Type Description Response str "success" or InvalidURLException
